meetings.title: Sapient AI & Google Nano Banana
meetings.description:
Breakthrough AI architecture exploration and advanced image generation tools demonstration. 
                                We explored the revolutionary Hierarchical Reasoning Model (HRM) from Sapient AI, which represents 
                                a major breakthrough in AI architecture with its self-evolving capabilities. Additionally, we 
                                demonstrated Google's Nano Banana, a hyper-efficient image generation tool that's revolutionizing 
                                creative workflows.

presenters.name: Atanas Dimitrov
presenters.bio: AI enthusiast and presenter at Nuvolo & Trane Technologies

meetings.title: Eva 2.0 Beta Features
meetings.description:
Comprehensive overview of Eva 2.0 Beta and its corporate AI functionalities. We explored 
                                Nuvolo & Trane Technologies' advanced corporate AI assistant built on GPT-4.1, focusing on workplace productivity 
                                features, Canvas integration, and enterprise-level AI capabilities.

meetings.title: Gemini vs GPT Tasks
meetings.description:
Comparison between Gemini Scheduled Actions and GPT Tasks with auto-generated news website demo. 
                                We conducted a comprehensive analysis of automation capabilities, comparing Google's Gemini 
                                scheduled actions with OpenAI's GPT Tasks, including a live demonstration of automated 
                                content generation.

meetings.title: Advanced AI Integrations
meetings.description:
Exploration of advanced AI integrations in enterprise environments, focusing on API 
                                integrations, custom implementations, and workflow optimizations for business processes.

meetings.title: AI-Powered Development Tools
meetings.description:
Deep dive into AI-powered development environments, code generation tools, and 
                                automated testing solutions that enhance developer productivity and code quality.

meetings.title: Machine Learning Workflows
meetings.description:
Introduction to machine learning workflows, model training, and deployment strategies 
                                in enterprise environments. Explored practical applications and implementation approaches.

meetings.title: WindSurf Coding Tool
meetings.description:
Successful demonstration of WindSurf AI-powered coding tool by non-developer colleague. 
                                This groundbreaking session showed how AI can democratize software development, enabling 
                                non-technical team members to create sophisticated applications.

presenters.name: Nino
presenters.bio: AI enthusiast and presenter at Nuvolo & Trane Technologies

meetings.title: AI Infrastructure Introduction
meetings.description:
Introduction to Gemini and OpenAI GPT infrastructure, laying the foundation for our AI journey. 
                                This inaugural meeting established the groundwork for our AI Cafe community, introducing 
                                fundamental concepts and setting the stage for future explorations.
